heading: Success Stories
subheading: See how PortfolioAI has helped early-career professionals land their dream jobs

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.quote: PortfolioAI transformed my basic resume into a comprehensive portfolio that helped me stand out. I received interview calls from 3 top companies within a week!

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.quote: The AI mock interviews were incredibly realistic and helped me prepare for tough technical questions. I'm now working at my dream company thanks to PortfolioAI.

testimonials.name: Jessica Williams
testimonials.quote: I was skeptical about AI-written cover letters, but PortfolioAI created personalized letters that perfectly highlighted my experience for each job application.
